attributes.action: Hold a General Election so the public can decide if we leave on October31 or not
attributes.additional_details:
The Prime Minster told us "The choice is in your hands"
and Parliament agreed to honour the result and backed the referendum.  It was a binary vote: 
"Should the United Kingdom remain a member of the European Union or leave the European Union?"  

It wasn't "do you want to remain a member, leave with a deal, or leave without a deal" 

Leave won by 1,269,501 over 1.2million people but they won't carry out our decision. They think they know better 

A General Election before 31 October will decide
attributes.background:
We were asked to make the "biggest decision of our lifetime" a vote for In or Out of the EU in 2016.
The result has not yet been honoured
As Parliament is gridlocked it should be a decision for the General Public
So we need a General Election before October 31
